channel.title: Service Enumeration :: HackForge
channel.description: General Service Enumeration Nmap Service Discovery Detect service versions nmap -sV $ip Aggressive version detection nmap -sV --version-all $ip Scan all ports and detect services nmap -p- -sV $ip Run default scripts for enumeration nmap -sC -sV $ip Banner Grabbing (Manual) Connect to a web service nc -v $ip 80 SMTP enumeration telnet $ip 25 Get HTTP headers curl -I $ip DNS Enumeration Nmap DNS Enumeration Brute-force subdomains
